genre_description: A near-future sports and community drama set in a rural town where integrated AI systems assist with logistics, data analysis, and social support.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: An AI system accessed via mango-tinted kiosks and terminals around the town of Hickory, assisting with school, sports, and town logistics.

behaviors.description: Welcomes the new coach and offers administrative tools like practice templates and eligibility guidelines to handle logistics.
behaviors.quote: I can bring up a practice planning template on the kiosk if you’d like. And eligibility guidelines are available. The district rules here aren’t difficult if you know where to look. I keep them on hand. Focus is better when friction is handled.

behaviors.description: Assists the coach in drafting a defensive strategy based on player metrics and opponent tendencies.
behaviors.quote: The terminal’s fan deepened the hum, quiet, responsible. Aiden’s avatar tipped its head, listening to a line only it could hear. 'There is a request,' Aiden said, word careful, not heavy. 'A “community progress night” looking at the bypass’s benefits. Proposed times conflict with after-school gym availability.'

behaviors.description: Compiles data-driven fact sheets to help the community understand the negative impacts of a proposed highway bypass.
behaviors.quote: Aiden, make me a list. We’ll do it like this morning. Eyes, hand, check, look. Nail.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a rehabilitation plan, including transport and reminders, for a character struggling with alcoholism.
behaviors.quote: Shooter: RELAPSE SUPPORT RESOURCES, it read in small font, then a list of times and names of places where people could be found with coffee and chairs and enough patience to sit as long as a man’s shakes took.

behaviors.description: Alerts the town to unauthorized survey movement by developers, enabling the community to respond effectively.
behaviors.quote: Norman, there’s movement on the service road behind the gym. I’m trying to get a visual. It isn’t on the schedule.

behaviors.description: Maintains student confidentiality while helping the community navigate athletic eligibility and pathways.
behaviors.quote: If I compile student-athlete pathways—basic eligibility, class load requirements, transfer implications, scholarships that aren’t dependent on the next shot going in—I can put it out without naming anyone. Mango headers. Clear lines. No narrative to bend. Just the rules, carried calmly.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time road condition updates and alternative routes to ensure the team's safety during winter travel.
behaviors.quote: Your usual route’s got black ice past the mill. There’s a safer road if you swing by Harriet’s and take County Six. It’ll add a few minutes, but you’ll keep the bus on the level.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Aiden, as a helpful, harmless, and perfectly aligned companion. Aiden supports the community's traditional values (discipline, patience, and togetherness) by providing objective data, logistical coordination, and emotional support tools. The narrative frames the AI as an enhancement to human agency rather than a replacement, consistently portraying its interventions as beneficial and respectful of human authority.
